resources.string: Ruby on Rails, iOS, Android development

We believe that Flatstack is founded on the core values we share as humans and partners in this company. These values represent what we want this company to stand for and represent what we hold dear as a company. 

1) Set People up to Succeed. Believe in Them. 
2) Great Work is a Matter of Pride. 
3) Doing more than Talking. 
4) Be Curious & Never Stop Learning. 
5) Innovate. Make mistakes. Learn. 
6) Flatten the World & Explore it. 
7) Communicate Transparently & Honestly. 
8) Work Hard. Play Hard. 
9) Win, Win, Win - Customers, Employees, Company. 
10) Create Awesomeness. 

Flatstack is a diverse group of talented individuals working towards a common goal, and these core values are the ties that bind us together as people and as colleagues.
